general_advisory: Prepare the wet nursery seed beds for paddy. Using rainwater the nursery beds may puddle 2-3 times followed by planking. Apply 200 kg of FYM, 4 kg of DAP, 2.5 kg of MOP and 1 kg of Zinc sulphate during last puddling. Divide nursery area into smaller plots of convenient length. Irrigation channels of size 30 cm in width should be made along the beds for irrigation/drainage purpose. Sprouted Seeds should be sown @ 40-50 g/m2 area of seed bed by treating them with Carbendazim 50% W.P or Carboxin 37.5% + Thiram 37.5% before sowing in the nursery.

advisory: Nursery Management - Prepare the wet nursery seed beds for paddy. Using rainwater the nursery beds may puddle 2-3 times followed by planking. Apply 200 kg of FYM, 4 kg of DAP, 2.5 kg of MOP and 1 kg of Zinc sulphate during last puddling. Divide nursery area into smaller plots of convenient length. Irrigation channels of size 30 cm in width should be made along the beds for irrigation/drainage purpose. Sprouted Seeds should be sown @ 40-50 g/m2 area of seed bed by treating them with Carbendazim 50% W.P or Carboxin 37.5% + Thiram 37.5% before sowing in the nursery. Seed treatment - Treat the paddy seeds with Carbendazim 50% W.P @ 1.5 g/1kg of seeds or Carboxin 37.5% + Thiram 37.5 % @ 3 g /1 kg of seeds before sowing in the nursery.

Yellow mosaic virus - Present weather condition is favourable for the incidence of yellow mosaic virus which is caused by the vector white fly. To control go for spraying of triazophos @ 400 ml/acre or Acetamipride @ 40 g per acre.

Yellow mosaic virus - Present weather condition is favourable for the incidence of yellow mosaic virus which is caused by the vector white fly. To control go for spraying of triazophos @ 400 ml/acre or Acetamipride @ 40 g per acre.
Wilting: In view of high humid condition wilting may occur at this stage. Spray Mancozeb 75% WP @ 2g/ltr of water if symptom is noticed.
Fruit & Shoot borer: Install pheromone trap @ 8nos/acre to monitor pest population.
To manage Alternaria leaf spot disease in Cole crops spray Mancozeb 75 % WP @ 600 -gram/acre or carbendazim 12 % + Mancozeb 63 % WP @ 400 -gram/acre by mixing in 200 litres of water.
Remove the wilted plants from the field and destroy them away from the field.
Aphids and Jassids infestation may be seen the field. To manage it spray Imidachloprid 17.8% SL @ 1 ml/lt.

Leaf eating caterpillar - To manage the leaf eating caterpillar biologically use Pheromone trap Spodolure @ 6/acre or Install light trap @ 5 nos. Apply Bacillus thuringiensis @ 500 g/acre or Beauveria bassiana @ 1kg/acre. For chemical control, spray Chlorpyriphos 50 % + Cypermethrin E.C @ 400 with 200 litres of water.
